Smart Coffee Grinder: Create a coffee grinder that can adjust its grind settings based on the type of coffee beans being used. This grinder will use a built-in sensor to detect the type of beans and automatically adjust the grind size for optimal flavor extraction.

Portable Coffee Grinder: Design a compact and lightweight coffee grinder that can be easily taken on the go. This grinder will have a rechargeable battery and a compact design that fits easily into a bag or backpack.

Automatic Coffee Grinder: Create a coffee grinder that can grind the beans automatically, without the need for manual intervention. This grinder will use a built-in timer to grind the beans at the perfect time, ensuring a consistent grind every time.

Customizable Coffee Grinder: Design a coffee grinder that allows users to customize the grind settings to their liking. This grinder will have a user-friendly interface that allows users to adjust the grind size, shape, and speed to suit their preferred coffee brewing method.

Coffee Grinder with Built-In Brewing: Create a coffee grinder that also includes a built-in brewing system. This grinder will have a built-in coffee maker that can brew a perfect cup of coffee using the freshly ground beans. This will save time and effort for coffee lovers who want to enjoy a freshly brewed cup of coffee without any hassle.
